document.full_text: a texas woman was charged with second-degree murder in the apparent asphyxiation death of her young son whose body was found alongside a road in maine, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: mother charged with murder of 6-year-old son found in maine
lines_and_colors: a texas woman was charged with second-degree murder in the apparent asphyxiation death of her young son whose body was found alongside a road in maine, authorities said on thursday.
